lp: Get the luka pona sign of a toki pona word
lp-word: The word you want to get the luka pona sign of.
lp-hide: Whether to show the sign to only you. Defaults to true.
lukapona: Get the luka pona sign of a toki pona word
lukapona-word: The word you want to get the luka pona sign of.
lukapona-hide: Whether to show the sign to only you. Defaults to true.
